TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Academy @ SXSW Gaming Expo

Articles.Content:
Youtuber [Mikes Games](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl-g4uYdzrlCtd9AOhAUfEw) stopped by the [Kerbal Space Academy](http://twitch.tv/dasvaldez) booth at the SXSW Gaming Expo and shot this quick video, where I ramble and generally make up stuff on the fly. For a person of my hygiene, I don't screw up nearly as much as one would expect. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/A5x5qu7mVF4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

TLDW: If you can be a sniper, race car driver, or fighter pilot in video games... why can't you be a rocket scientist? [Kerbal Space Academy](http://twitch.tv/dasvaldez) helps people of all ages do awesome things in KSP!
